glsa.title: Perl: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Perl, the worst of which could allow a local attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Perl is Larry Wallâ€™s Practical Extraction and Report Language.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Perl. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application. A context-dependent attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
